metadata.title: CVE-2015-5218 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in text-utils/colcrt.c in colcrt in util-linux before 2.27 allows local users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file, related to the page global variable.

notes.note: sbeattie> fixed in util-linux, but debian/ubuntu util-linux does not ship colcrt

criterions.comment: bsdmainutils package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
